name: BunnyHop (Fourtails)
description:
Bunnyhop is an experimental game of two friends who wanted to see if they could make a game.

Be a rabbit and run for your life in this endless runner game!Try new clothes (outfits) in the store when you have collected lots of carrots!

Rodrigo Machado (@Royoster_Royos) - Programming
Laísa Soares (@LasaSoaresdosS1) - Art
